uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.manager
Class DefaultMediaManager

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.manager.DefaultMediaManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MediaManager
public class DefaultMediaManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements MediaManager

Default implementation of a media manager component.

This implementation is incomplete and untested and might be removed at any time.

Constructor Summary
